sentences.en: Another aspect of executive presence is comportment—your way of conducting yourself in interacting with others.
sentences.cn: 领导者气质的另一方面就是举止风度——你与他人交流时行为表现。

sentences.en: However, practically there still is the comportment of abusing intellectual property right.
sentences.cn: 然而, 实践中却存在滥用知识产权行为.

sentences.en: I was touched deeply for his comportment to work.
sentences.cn: 他对工作的态度深深打动了我.

sentences.en: She won admiration for her comportment during the trial.
sentences.cn: 她在选拔赛中的表现得到了赞赏。

sentences.en: Their gee - whiz, faux - naif comportment is not always convincing ( Madison Bell )
sentences.cn: 他们耸人听闻的, 假纯朴的表现并不总是有说服力的 ( 麦迪逊贝尔 )
